clinical_study.brief_title: Covid 19 Pandemic. Emerging Legal and Ehical Disputes Over Patient Confidentiality
clinical_study.official_title: Covid 19 Pandemic. Emerging Legal and Ehical Disputes Over Patient Confidentiality

brief_summary.textblock:
Many critical ethical questions arise in pandemic covid 19planning, preparedness and
      response. These include: Who will get priority access to medications, vaccines and intensive
      care unit beds, given the potential shortage of these essential resources? In the face of a
      pandemic, what obligations do health-care workers have to work not withstanding risks to
      their own health and the health of their families? How can surveillance, isolation,
      quarantine and social-distancing measures be undertaken in a way that respects ethical norms?
      What obligations do countries have to one another with respect to pandemic covid 19 planning
      and response efforts?

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the ethical requirement of controlled disrupts of patients In case of infectious disease pandemic
primary_outcome.description: questionaire done to To keep the general preventive measure in the community

intervention.intervention_name: questionnair about Emerging Legal and Ehical Disputes Over Patient Confidentiality
intervention.description: Many critical ethical questions arise in pandemic covid 19planning, preparedness and response. These include: Who will get priority access to medications, vaccines and intensive care unit beds, given the potential shortage of these essential resources? In the face of a pandemic, what obligations do health-care workers have to work notwithstanding risks to their own health and the health of their families? How can surveillance, isolation, quarantine and social-distancing measures be undertaken in a way that respects ethical norms? What obligations do countries have to one another with respect to pandemic covid 19 planning and response efforts?

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  adult aged 18 years to 60 years

          -  medical personel graduated from egyptian faculty of medicine.

          -  non medical personel live in egypt

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  personel less than 18 years old .

          -  medical personel not graduated from egyptian faculty of medicine.

          -  non medical personel live outside egypt

responsible_party.investigator_title: lecturer of forensic medicine and clinical toxicology
